name: Into the WoodZ
description:
A camping trip in the WoodZ turns out to be a fight for Survival. Brain hungry Zombies are swarming your camp. Try to defend your campround and hold out as long as you can against the hordes of the undead. Use your gun or the explosives you brought... yes you brought some explosive mines... who wouldn't? 

The Game was made with Unity in my free time. It currently has 3 levels which have to be unlocked by scoring points in the other levels. I am working on  a Multiplayer Mode at the moment which will still need some time until it is finished. The Game will receive Updates in case any bugs are found or in case I decided to add some more stuff :D. I hope you are enjoying the Game in the state it is currently in and I would appreciate if you would leave a comment with some Feedback. 

Thanks for Playing!

  • MOVE - W/A/S/D
  • AIM - RMB
  • SHOOT - LMB
  • PLACE MINES - SPACE
  • FLASHLIGHT - F
  • PAUSE - ESCAPE
